title: Telepath

fields.name: Predict the Future (X1, Charge 110%):
fields.value: Target two players during the Evening and name an active, non-factional ability. If either player has that ability and is capable of using it, they will be forced to use that on the other player. You will not know if this ability succeeds, but your target will be told they were redirected.

fields.name: Inspect Heart:
fields.value: You will receive a list of players based on your score. Target a player from this list. You will see their current Defense Score and, if you placed in the Top 3, their current Attack Score.

desc:
Post 180
*I see... blood on your hands!* (Inspired by Luke's Massacards)
